{"id":949614317,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 day, 19 hours","timestamp":1683988862,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1809 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/949614317/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum in a Matrix","memory":"47.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int matrixSum(vector<vector<int>>& nums) {\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int k=0;k<nums[0].size();k++){\n            int maxo = INT_MIN;\n            for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n                int maxi = INT_MIN;\n                int ind = 0;\n                for(int j=0;j<nums[0].size();j++){\n                    if(nums[i][j] > maxi){\n                        ind = j;\n                        maxi = nums[i][j];\n                    }\n                }\n                nums[i][ind] = -1;\n                maxo = max(maxo, maxi);\n            }\n            ans += maxo;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-in-a-matrix","has_notes":false}
